tit.cmt: 「二十四輩」は下のセルで説明しているごとく，弟子および寺院のことなので，括弧内の説明が不適と思われます。削除しました。

sen.j: 二十四輩（にじゅうよはい）とは、親鸞の関東時代の高弟24人と、その24人を開基とする寺院のこと。
sen.e: Nijuyohai refers to the 24 top disciples of the monk Shinran during his Kanto days, as well as the temples that these disciples founded.
Nijuyohai refers to the 24 top disciples of the Buddhist monk Shinran when he propagated the Buddhist faith in the Kanto region, as well as the temples worshiping these disciples as founders.
sen.cmt: 言葉を補い，原文に忠実に訳しました。
sen.e: Nijuyohai refers to the 24 top disciples of the Buddhist monk Shinran when he propagated the Buddhist faith in the Kanto region, as well as the temples worshiping these disciples as founders.

sen.j: 全国に3巻現存する「二十四輩牒」が元となっている。
sen.e: The term originated from the book "Nijuyohai," of which 3 volumes exist Japan.
Existing three rolls of 'Nijuyohai-cho' (a document with joint signatures of 24 disciples) nationwide introduce the details of Nijuyohai.
sen.cmt: 「二十四輩牒」は連署と思われるので3 volumes は不適と考えます。「元となっている」は言葉の由来ではなく，内容を意味していると考えます。
sen.e: Existing three rolls of 'Nijuyohai-cho' (a document with joint signatures of 24 disciples) nationwide introduce the details of Nijuyohai.

sen.j: 時代が下り、親鸞の教えに背き誤った教義を広める者が増えたため、本来の教義を広め伝えるために、正しい教えを受け継ぐ直弟子を選出したものといわれている。
sen.e: It is believed that disciples directly linked to Shinran were chosen because many began to spread religious teachings deviating from Shinran's teachings with passage of time and there was need to disseminate and teach the true creed.

It is believed that Shinran, with the aim of propagating and handing down the original doctrine, chose direct disciples who would correctly inherit his teachings, against the background that an increasing number of people gradually run counter to the Shinran's teachings and propagated wrong doctrine.
sen.cmt: 「正しい教えを受け継ぐ」が訳漏れです。また，わかりづらいために書き換えました。
sen.e: It is believed that Shinran, with the aim of propagating and handing down the original doctrine, chose direct disciples who would correctly inherit his teachings, against the background that an increasing number of people gradually run counter to the Shinran's teachings and propagated wrong doctrine.

sen.j: 数多い門弟から24人が選ばれた基準や経緯は不明な点も多く諸説ある。
sen.e: Although the background and the standards by which the 24 were chosen over a larger number of disciples are unknown, there is no doubt that these 24 became an important presence in religious teahcing in the Kanto region.
It is uncertain and controversial how and why those 24 disciples were chosen among a large number of disciples.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。少々わかりづらいので書き換えました。
sen.e: It is uncertain and controversial how and why those 24 disciples were chosen among a large number of disciples.

sen.j: いずれにせよこの24人が、関東における布教の上で重大な地位を占めていたことは間違いない。
sen.e: However, it is an undoubted fact that those 24 disciples played an important role in propagating Buddhist faith in the Kanto region.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。「重大な地位を占め・・」が訳文ではわかりづらいと思います。
sen.e: However, it is an undoubted fact that those 24 disciples played an important role in propagating Buddhist faith in the Kanto region.

sen.j: なお、長年の間に移転・再建を繰り返したり、元の寺から分流するうちに、二十四輩格を持つ寺院は180ほどに増えた。
sen.e: With repeated transfers and reconstruction of temples over time, along with splitting of temples, the number of temples directly under the 24 grew to 180.

While the temples worshiped as Nijuyohai repeated relocations and rebuildings, with the establishment of branch temples, the number of temples with the status of Nijuyohai has increased to around 180.
sen.cmt: 訳文の後半が意味不明です。書き換えました。
sen.e: While the temples worshiped as Nijuyohai repeated relocations and rebuildings, with the establishment of branch temples, the number of temples with the status of Nijuyohai has increased to around 180.
